IMoveObject Class Reference

IMoveObject is an interface for providing Move related functionality. Any objects that modify or provide Move data are required to implement this class. More...

Detailed Description

IMoveObject is an interface for providing Move related functionality. Any objects that modify or provide Move data are required to implement this class.

Member Function Documentation

Gets the velocity of the object.

A constant pointer to the velocity.

Implemented in Explosion, and WaterStream.
